pullRequest.title: Use jpeg image attachments in CCK and display in React
pullRequest.bodyText:
This adds support for image attachments in @cucumber/react. The CCK has been updated to attach a real JPEG image. It shows up nicely in @cucumber/react's storybook.
Also adds attachment support to @cucumber/query. I accidentally put it in TestResultsQuery - it should go into a new AttachmentsQuery before we merge.

commit.message: Use jpeg image attachments in CCK and display in React

nodes.bodyText: This is odd. @vincent-psarga why was it empty before and why is it not anymore?

commit.message: Refactor @cucumber/query - combine into a single Query class
